The breathable cotton fabric ensures maximum comfort and ease of movement, making it an ideal choice for healthcare professionals. The scrub is easy to wash and maintain, ensuring longevity and durability

Hospital staff uniforms are designed to ensure hygiene, professionalism, and role identification. Doctors typically wear white coats over formal attire, symbolizing authority and cleanliness, often accompanied by a stethoscope and ID badge. Nurses wear scrubs in shades of blue, green, or white, paired with an ID badge and comfortable footwear for long shifts. Surgeons and operating theater staff don sterile green or blue scrubs, along with surgical gowns, gloves, caps, and masks to maintain sterility. Ward boys and support staff usually wear simple tunics or shirts with trousers, often in light colors like gray or blue, while housekeeping staff wear full-sleeved tunics with aprons and gloves, usually in brown or green for easy identification.

The ladies' hospital staff uniform varies based on roles, ensuring professionalism, hygiene, and comfort. Doctors typically wear a white coat over formal attire, such as a salwar suit, blouse with trousers, or a knee-length dress, paired with an ID badge and a stethoscope. Nurses usually wear scrubs in shades of blue, green, or white, consisting of a tunic with pants or a dress with an apron, designed for ease of movement during long shifts. Surgeons and operating theater staff wear sterile green or blue scrubs, along with surgical gowns, gloves, caps, and masks to maintain sterility.

Children’s patient uniforms in hospitals are designed for comfort, ease of movement, and hygiene. They typically consist of a loose-fitting, soft cotton or polyester-cotton blend gown or pajama set, ensuring breathability and minimizing irritation on sensitive skin. These uniforms come in cheerful colors like light blue, pink, yellow, or green, often featuring playful patterns such as cartoon characters, animals, or stars to create a child-friendly environment and reduce anxiety. The gowns usually have back or side ties for easy wear and medical access, while pajama sets include button-up or V-neck tops with elastic-waist pants for added comfort.

An orthopedic surgeon's gown is a specialized surgical garment designed for maximum protection, sterility, and comfort during procedures. It is typically made of high-quality, fluid-resistant, and breathable fabric, such as reinforced non-woven or disposable materials, to prevent contamination and ensure durability. The gown is full-length with long sleeves that have elastic or knit cuffs to fit securely under sterile gloves.

A lightweight, breathable, and fluid-resistant disposable doctor coat designed for single-use applications. Made from non-woven fabric, it provides protection against contaminants while ensuring comfort. It features long sleeves with elastic cuffs, a front button or Velcro closure, and a standard collar. Available in sizes Small (S), Medium (M), and Large (L), it is ideal for healthcare professionals, laboratory use, and clinical settings.

High-quality, single-use disposable gloves designed for general protection and hygiene. Made from latex, nitrile, or polyethylene (depending on the type), these gloves provide a comfortable fit with flexibility for ease of movement. The free-size design ensures a universal fit for most users, making them suitable for medical, laboratory, food handling, and general-purpose use.

Product_Name: Disposable Shoe Cover With Thick Elastic Pair
Description: A protective shoe cover made from durable, water-resistant, and anti-slip material to prevent contamination and maintain hygiene in medical, industrial, and cleanroom environments. It features a thick elastic band for a secure fit, ensuring it stays in place during use. Ideal for hospitals, laboratories, and sterile environments, these shoe covers help prevent the spread of dirt and bacteria.

A full-body disposable coverall suit designed for superior protection against dust, liquids, and contaminants. Made from lightweight, breathable, and fluid-resistant non-woven material, it features a front zipper closure, elastic cuffs, and a hood for complete coverage. Commonly used in medical, laboratory, industrial, and hazardous environments, this suit ensures safety while maintaining comfort and ease of movement.

Product_Name: Gloves PE for general use or examination(100-Pcs)
Description: A pack of 100 disposable polyethylene (PE) gloves designed for general use and medical examination. These gloves are lightweight, transparent, and easy to wear, providing basic protection against dirt, chemicals, and contaminants. The ambidextrous design allows for easy fitting on both hands, making them ideal for hospitals, food handling, cleaning, and everyday hygiene applications.
